features: Superior Craftsmanship - Each Huusk Japan knife is skillfully forged, carrying the spirit of ancient legends. Expert artisans meticulously shape the blade through a journey of heat treatment, forging, and precise edge sharpening. The unique hammered texture on the blade makes it beautiful and anti-stick, making it easy to clean and maintain. Huusk Viking knife is a true testament to the rich heritage of Viking craftsmanship

Unyielding Strength - To do a good job, a chef needs the best knives. Constructed from premium high-carbon steel, Huusk chef knives are designed to stand the test of time. Its distinctive curved design maximizes contact with the cutting board, enabling efficient cutting. With a blade thickness of 4mm and a precise 15-degree edge at 0.25mm on both sides, the meat cleaver offers unparalleled sharpness and resilience

Precision & Versatility - Experience effortless slicing and trimming with the rounded belly and curved blade design of Huusk boning knives. And the unique top curvature of the meat knife ensures clean cuts and easier peeling. The included fine leather sheath adds convenience for outdoor activities like grilling, camping, and hiking. Like a protagonist in an epic tale, Huusk butcher knife empowers you to unleash your culinary creativity

Ergonomic Excellence - Our Viking knife features a full tang construction, providing exceptional balance and stability. With added "finger holes" and a non-slip cutout design, you can enjoy a firmer grip and enhanced control when tackling tougher cuts. The handle, reminiscent of a hero's grip on a trophy, is ergonomically designed for comfort and control

Impeccable Gift - Our professional Japanese kitchen knife offers exceptional flexibility, maneuverability, and cost-effectiveness compared to other cooking knives. Beautifully packaged in a gift box, making it the perfect gift for birthdays, Christmas, Thanksgiving, or any special occasion. Additionally, we provide a 30-day money-back guarantee and a 12-month replacement warranty, ensuring you receive the best value for your investment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT!! GREAT DEAL!!
reviews.reviewText: I love these Huusk knives so much this is now knife number 5 (see my other reviews) but this is my favorite one! I bought it for hunting & fishing but tested it in my professional kitchen....and I love it!!! Beautiful thick wood handle that curves coupled with the finger hole in the blade makes for a perfect ergonomic fit. Like, it fits so absolutely perfectly it's a true arm extension tool that handles perfectly and yes, it can be used as a defensive weapon (against bears, of course). The blade is definitely the coolest one yet, super sharp as usual with a beautiful hand-forged pattern. The dimples are beautifully decorative and help to keep food from sticking, the jagged side is perfect for fish scaling and scoring meat. The sheath makes it perfectly convenient for carrying anywhere. And of course the price makes it hands down the best deal anywhere for a knife of this quality with these features. As a chef and an outdoorsman I totally endorse this this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it so much.
reviews.reviewText: I grew up in the country. So my dad always harped on the old "Case" knives. And the other old brands. Because of strong and sharp they were. These knives are really sharp. I own a few different styles of these. And they all have held their edges very well. Cost wise... I always wait and buy them on sale. Lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is more than a beautiful knife. It's sharp, excellent quality and the perfect addition to my kitchen cutlery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great quality and love the look. It’s a little difficult when cutting some things but i believe its just getting used to the design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can There Be Perfection In A Knife ?!?
reviews.reviewText: YES !!! This Huusk 9” Kiritsuke chef knife is everything I dreamed of all in one knife. Every detail of this knife SCREAMS flawlessly ultimate quality! The handle fits my hand perfectly and is machined as smooth as silk. The 9” blade length is the length I’ve been looking for. The weight and balance of this knife is beyond my wildest expectations for my comfort and feeling like it’s an extension of my arm that I was born with. The hammered dimpling on the blade “releases” every type of food that I gently stroke through with no sticking whatsoever. And sharpness ?!? Oh my! Beef, tomatoes, onions, celery and a hard baguette that I stroked through today for my first use felt like THEY WEREN’T EVEN THERE ! Thank you, Huusk !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is so sharp I'm almost afraid to use it. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good knife from china!!!!! Its ok but not hand crafted.
reviews.reviewText: First of all notice they all have the same identical marks on the blades, You will never find two handmade knives anywhere close to Identical. Huusk japan is the name, not!!! where its made. I know a respected knife maker and he says a hand forged knife like this would be hundreds of dollars and many days to make. Its all marketing lies and hype. They use "pot" metal for the blades only a slight step above Pakistan made knives. Now are they worthless? No. Your not getting even a hint of what they say your getting except for metal content.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
